reviews.review_msg: Great explainer, I learned more stats in this course than the actual stats course. Tells stories to keep the class entertaining and very patient when asking questions. Only thing I personally didn't like was having to write the whole paper from a sole "how to" link despite the fact that it's 50%, but that's to do with class setup than Richard
GREATEST PROFESSOR OF ALL TIME. If you haven't had him for a class you are missing out!!

The course content is very dry but the course as a whole is not mind blowing hard. All thats needed is to get him on your good side and make him feel bad for you then you will get extra marks if not a whole letter grade higher!! No lie!!!!!
